mapper.select: select count(*) from users
select count(*) from users where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select a.* from (select a.*, rownum r from (select * from users where ${sel} like '%'|| #{search} || '%') a order by reg desc) a where r >= ${startRow} and r <= ${endRow}

select count(*) from (select rownum r, A.* from (select * from(select A.code, B.nickname, A.id, A.subject, A.reg from free A, users B where A.id = B.id union select A.code, B.nickname, A.id, A.subject, A.reg from diary A, users B where A.id = B.id)order by reg desc) A)

select count(*) from (select rownum r, A.* from (select * from(select A.code, B.nickname, A.id, A.subject, A.reg from free A, users B where A.id = B.id union select A.code, B.nickname, A.id, A.subject, A.reg from diary A, users B where A.id = B.id)where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by reg desc) A)

select count(*) from (select code, commen, regcomm from diarycomment union all select code, commen, regcomm from challengecomment union all select code, ctt, reg from freecomment order by regcomm desc)

select * from (select rownum r, A.* from ( select A.commentnum, A.code, A.writer, B.nickname, A.commen, A.regcomm from diarycomment A, users B where A.writer = B.id union all select A.commentnum, A.code, A.writer, B.nickname, A.commen, A.regcomm from challengecomment A, users B where A.writer = B.id union all select A.commentnum, A.code, A.writer, B.nickname, A.ctt, A.reg from freecomment A, users B where A.writer = B.id order by regcomm desc) A) where r >= ${startRow} and r <= ${endRow}

select count(*) from (select code, commen, regcomm from diarycomment where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' union all select code, commen, regcomm from challengecomment where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' union all select code, ctt, reg from freecomment where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by regcomm desc)

select * from (select rownum r, A.* from ( select A.commentnum, A.code, A.writer, B.nickname, A.commen, A.regcomm from diarycomment A, users B where A.writer = B.id and A.${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' union all select A.commentnum, A.code, A.writer, B.nickname, A.commen, A.regcomm from challengecomment A, users B where A.writer = B.id and A.${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' union all select A.commentnum, A.code, A.writer, B.nickname, A.ctt, A.reg from freecomment A, users B where A.writer = B.id and A.${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by regcomm desc) A) where r >= ${startRow} and r <= ${endRow}
select count(*) from question
select count(*) from question where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select count(*) from notice
select * from(select rownum r, A.* from(select * from notice) A) where r >= ${startRow} and r <= ${endRow}
select count(*) from notice where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select * from(select rownum r, A.* from(select * from notice where ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%') A) where r >= ${startRow} and r <= ${endRow}
select * from report where reportnum = #{value}
select count(*) from report where process = #{value}
select count(*) from report where process = ${process} and ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select B.* from (select A.*, rownum r from (select * from report where process = ${process} order by reg desc) A) B where r >= #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
select B.* from (select A.*, rownum r from (select * from report where process = ${process} and ${sel} like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by reg desc) A) B where r >= #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
mapper.update: update report set process = 1 where reportnum = #{value}
update users set reportcount = reportcount + 1 where id = #{value}
update users set warncount = floor(reportcount/3) where reportcount != 0
